languages.text: "Смелая болтовня. Не думал{mf||а}, что я это тебе позволил, чтобы ты сам{mf||а} приш{mf|ел|ла} мне в руки — {mf|весь|вся} так{mf|ой|ая} уверенн{mf|ый|ая} в себе... Впрочем, именно излишняя самоуверенность тебя и погубила".

traits.locale_text: "Смелая болтовня. Не думал{mf||а}, что я это тебе позволил, чтобы ты сам{mf||а} приш{mf|ел|ла} мне в руки — {mf|весь|вся} так{mf|ой|ая} уверенн{mf|ый|ая} в себе... Впрочем, именно излишняя самоуверенность тебя и погубила".

languages.text: "Brave words. But have you considered the possibility that I have allowed you to stride ever so confidently into my hands? It is that overconfidence that has sealed your fate."
languages.original_text: "Смелая болтовня. Не думал{mf||а}, что я это тебе позволил, чтобы ты сам{mf||а} приш{mf|ел|ла} мне в руки — {mf|весь|вся} так{mf|ой|ая} уверенн{mf|ый|ая} в себе... Впрочем, именно излишняя самоуверенность тебя и погубила".

traits.locale_text: "Brave words. But have you considered the possibility that I have allowed you to stride ever so confidently into my hands? And it is that overconfidence that has sealed your fate."
"Brave words. But have you considered the possibility that I have allowed you to stride ever so confidently into my hands? And it is that overconfidence that has sealed your fate."
"Brave words. But have you considered the possibility that I have allowed you to stride ever so confidently into my hands? It is that overconfidence that has sealed your fate."
"Brave words. But have you considered the possibility that I have allowed you to stride ever so confidently into my hands? It is that overconfidence that has sealed your fate."
"Brave words. But have you considered the possibility that I have allowed you to stride ever so confidently into my hands? It is that overconfidence that has sealed your fate."
"Brave words. But have you considered the possibility that I have allowed you to stride ever so confidently into my hands? It is that overconfidence that has sealed your fate."

languages.text: «Valientes palabras, pero ¿te has parado a pensar que tal vez te haya permitido caminar a tus anchas para conducirte a una trampa? Tu soberbia ha sellado tu destino».
languages.original_text: "Brave words. But have you considered the possibility that I have allowed you to stride ever so confidently into my hands? It is that overconfidence that has sealed your fate."

traits.locale_text: «Valientes palabras, pero ¿te has parado a pensar que tal vez te haya permitido caminar a tus anchas para conducirte a una trampa? Tu soberbia ha sellado tu destino».

languages.text: “你还真敢说啊，不过你想没想过，说不定是我故意让你登船，好让你大摇大摆地闯进来，栽在我手里呢？你太自大了，你的傲慢只会害死你。”
languages.original_text: "Brave words. But have you considered the possibility that I have allowed you to stride ever so confidently into my hands? It is that overconfidence that has sealed your fate."

traits.locale_text: “你还真敢说啊，不过你想没想过，说不定是我故意让你登船，好让你大摇大摆地闯进来，栽在我手里呢？你太自大了，你的傲慢只会害死你。”

languages.text: « Vous avez l'air bien {mf|sûr|sûre} de vous, mais avez-vous songé à l'éventualité que je vous aie délibérément {mf|laissé|laissée} venir jusqu'à moi ? En fin de compte, c'est votre outrecuidance qui aura scellé votre perte. »
languages.original_text: "Brave words. But have you considered the possibility that I have allowed you to stride ever so confidently into my hands? It is that overconfidence that has sealed your fate."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez l'air bien {mf|sûr|sûre} de vous, mais avez-vous songé à l'éventualité que je vous aie délibérément {mf|laissé|laissée} venir jusqu'à moi ? En fin de compte, c'est votre outrecuidance qui aura scellé votre perte. »

languages.text: 「勇敢なことだ。だが、お前は今まで自分で私の手の中に滑り落ちてくるように仕向けられていたと考えたことはないのかね？それは、お前の運命を封鎖しているあの過信だ」
languages.original_text: "Brave words. But have you considered the possibility that I have allowed you to stride ever so confidently into my hands? It is that overconfidence that has sealed your fate."

traits.locale_text: 「勇敢なことだ。だが、お前は今まで自分で私の手の中に滑り落ちてくるように仕向けられていたと考えたことはないのかね？それは、お前の運命を封鎖しているあの過信だ」

languages.text: "Cesur sözler. Peki ya böyle rahat bir şekilde avucuma düşmene müsaade etmiş olabileceğimi hiç düşündün mü? Aşırı öz güvenin, kaderini belirlemiş oldu."
languages.original_text: "Brave words. But have you considered the possibility that I have allowed you to stride ever so confidently into my hands? It is that overconfidence that has sealed your fate."

traits.locale_text: "Cesur sözler. Peki ya böyle rahat bir şekilde avucuma düşmene müsaade etmiş olabileceğimi hiç düşündün mü? Aşırı öz güvenin, kaderini belirlemiş oldu."

languages.text: "Starke Worte. Aber habt Ihr je die Möglichkeit in Betracht gezogen, ich könnte zugelassen haben, dass Ihr so selbstbewusst in meine Falle tappt? Eure Selbstüberschätzung hat Euer Schicksal besiegelt."
languages.original_text: "Brave words. But have you considered the possibility that I have allowed you to stride ever so confidently into my hands? It is that overconfidence that has sealed your fate."

traits.locale_text: "Starke Worte. Aber habt Ihr je die Möglichkeit in Betracht gezogen, ich könnte zugelassen haben, dass Ihr so selbstbewusst in meine Falle tappt? Eure Selbstüberschätzung hat Euer Schicksal besiegelt."
